mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.pantone_id As pantoneId, ifnull(b.zh_name,b.en_name) AS pantoneName, a.material_id AS materialId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.remark AS remark
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_kf_material_pantone a,t_jc_pantone b WHERE a.del_flag=0 AND b.del_flag=0 AND a.material_id =#{materialId} and a.pantone_id = b.pantone_id
AND a.type = #{type}
AND a.type = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_kf_material_pantone a SET a.pantone_id =#{pantoneId}, a.pantone_name =#{pantoneName}, a.remark = #{remark} WHERE a.material_id =#{materialId}
